summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5885 for the improvement of 31st Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77541, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
